name: NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.instNontrivial
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field K
inst✝ : NumberField K
⊢ Nontrivial (NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing K)
decl:
instance [NumberField K] : Nontrivial (InfiniteAdeleRing K) :=
  (inferInstanceAs <| Nonempty (InfinitePlace K)).elim fun w => Pi.nontrivial_at w

name: NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.instTopologicalRing
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : Field K
⊢ TopologicalRing (NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing K)

name: NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.algebraMap_apply
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : Field K
x : K
v : NumberField.InfinitePlace K
⊢ Eq ((algebraMap K (NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing K)) x v) ↑x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem algebraMap_apply (x : K) (v : InfinitePlace K) :
    algebraMap K (InfiniteAdeleRing K) x v = x := rfl

name: NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.locallyCompactSpace
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Field K
inst✝ : NumberField K
⊢ LocallyCompactSpace (NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing K)
decl:
/-- The infinite adele ring is locally compact. -/
instance locallyCompactSpace [NumberField K] : LocallyCompactSpace (InfiniteAdeleRing K) :=
  Pi.locallyCompactSpace_of_finite

name: NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.ringEquiv_mixedSpace_apply
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : Field K
x : NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing K
⊢ Eq ((NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.ringEquiv_mixedSpace K) x) { fst := fun v => (NumberField.InfinitePlace.Completion.extensionEmbeddingOfIsReal ⋯) (x ↑v), snd := fun v => (NumberField.InfinitePlace.Completion.extensionEmbedding ↑v) (x ↑v) }
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ringEquiv_mixedSpace_apply (x : InfiniteAdeleRing K) :
    ringEquiv_mixedSpace K x =
      (fun (v : {w : InfinitePlace K // IsReal w}) => extensionEmbeddingOfIsReal v.2 (x v),
       fun (v : {w : InfinitePlace K // IsComplex w}) => extensionEmbedding v.1 (x v)) := rfl

name: NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.mixedEmbedding_eq_algebraMap_comp
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝ : Field K
x : K
⊢ Eq ((NumberField.mixedEmbedding K) x) ((NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing.ringEquiv_mixedSpace K) ((algebraMap K (NumberField.InfiniteAdeleRing K)) x))
decl:
/-- Transfers the embedding of `x ↦ (x)ᵥ` of the number field `K` into its infinite adele
ring to the mixed embedding `x ↦ (φᵢ(x))ᵢ` of `K` into the space `ℝ ^ r₁ × ℂ ^ r₂`, where
`(r₁, r₂)` is the signature of `K` and `φᵢ` are the complex embeddings of `K`. -/
theorem mixedEmbedding_eq_algebraMap_comp {x : K} :
    mixedEmbedding K x = ringEquiv_mixedSpace K (algebraMap K _ x) := by
  ext v <;> simp only [ringEquiv_mixedSpace_apply, algebraMap_apply,
    ringEquivRealOfIsReal, ringEquivComplexOfIsComplex, extensionEmbedding,
    extensionEmbeddingOfIsReal, extensionEmbedding_of_comp, RingEquiv.coe_ofBijective,
    RingHom.coe_mk, MonoidHom.coe_mk, OneHom.coe_mk, UniformSpace.Completion.extensionHom]
  · rw [UniformSpace.Completion.extension_coe
      (WithAbs.isUniformInducing_of_comp <| v.1.norm_embedding_of_isReal v.2).uniformContinuous x]
    exact mixedEmbedding.mixedEmbedding_apply_ofIsReal _ _ _
  · rw [UniformSpace.Completion.extension_coe
      (WithAbs.isUniformInducing_of_comp <| v.1.norm_embedding_eq).uniformContinuous x]
    exact mixedEmbedding.mixedEmbedding_apply_ofIsComplex _ _ _

name: NumberField.AdeleRing.instTopologicalRing
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
K : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : IsDedekindDomain R
inst✝² : Field K
inst✝¹ : Algebra R K
inst✝ : IsFractionRing R K
⊢ TopologicalRing (NumberField.AdeleRing R K)

name: NumberField.AdeleRing.algebraMap_fst_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
K : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : IsDedekindDomain R
inst✝² : Field K
inst✝¹ : Algebra R K
inst✝ : IsFractionRing R K
x : K
v : NumberField.InfinitePlace K
⊢ Eq (((algebraMap K (NumberField.AdeleRing R K)) x).1 v) ↑x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem algebraMap_fst_apply (x : K) (v : InfinitePlace K) :
    (algebraMap K (AdeleRing R K) x).1 v = x := rfl

name: NumberField.AdeleRing.algebraMap_snd_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
K : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : IsDedekindDomain R
inst✝² : Field K
inst✝¹ : Algebra R K
inst✝ : IsFractionRing R K
x : K

⊢ Eq ((fun v => ↑((algebraMap K (NumberField.AdeleRing R K)) x).2 v) v) ↑x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem algebraMap_snd_apply (x : K) (v : HeightOneSpectrum R) :
    (algebraMap K (AdeleRing R K) x).2 v = x := rfl

name: NumberField.AdeleRing.algebraMap_injective
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
K : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : CommRing R
inst✝⁴ : IsDedekindDomain R
inst✝³ : Field K
inst✝² : Algebra R K
inst✝¹ : IsFractionRing R K
inst✝ : NumberField K
⊢ Function.Injective ⇑(algebraMap K (NumberField.AdeleRing R K))
decl:
theorem algebraMap_injective [NumberField K] : Function.Injective (algebraMap K (AdeleRing R K)) :=
  fun _ _ hxy => (algebraMap K _).injective (Prod.ext_iff.1 hxy).1
